job.description: ltpgtltstronggt100 REMOTEltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWere looking for a Machine Learning Data Engineer with an affinity for machine learning infrastructure and model development Excellent opportunity to work for a leading eCommerce organization in a role with full remote flexibilityltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilities of the Machine Learning Data EngineerltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtPrototype and research ML featuresltligtltligtDrive ML solutions in Spark and Tensorflow to productionltligtltligtPresent and communicate internally and externallyltligtltligtParticipate in continuous improvement of teams engineering processes and infrastructureltligtltligtMentor and coach junior engineers and participate in code and design reviewsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequirements of the Machine Learning Data EngineerltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtDemonstrated ability to analyze large data sets and identify gapsltligtltligtAbility to design and deploy solutions in a Hadoop environmentltligtltligtProficiency in Java and Linux environmentsltligtltligtBasic ML knowledgeltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtKeywords Data Engineer Machine Learning ML Spark Tensorflow eCommerce 100 RemoteltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtJob ID 352986ltpgt
